lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: My sister loaned me some money when I was twelve years old. We went together to Sears and found some white fabric with red strawberries on sale and we bought some red rickrack too. We went home and I made several aprons. I went from house to house in the neighborhood selling the aprons explaining I was earning money for summer camp. I sold out the first batch and had to go back for more fabric. I was able to pay half my way to summer camp (my parents paid the other half) and pay my sister back. Small loans work. My sister helped me when I needed it. Kiva is an opportunity for me to help somebody as my sister helped me.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I was very fortunate to be born in a part of the world where things are more easily available.  I want to help make a difference for those people who are as hard working but who just need a little help to get things off the ground.

lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a good way for "direct" help.

Stefanie teaches aerobics, weightlifting, yoga, Pilates, and cycling for exercise in gyms throughout Houston.   In our leisure time, we both love to read and travel.

lenders.occupational_info:
I'm very aware and grateful of how blessed we all are in our part of this world & how great the disparity is between us & most of the world's population. I dedicate a great 
deal of time & energy in trying to improve the state of our environment for our descendants & believe what Deitrich Bonhoeffer is quoted as saying, that - " The ultimate test of a moral society is the kind of world it leaves for it's children." We all need to walk the talk and set an example , or as Gandhi said :  "Be the change you want to see in the world."

lenders.occupational_info: We offer special education to children with disabilities in Fada N'Gourma a town where such school does not exist. The courses consist to tutor children who have difficulties to hear or see, who cannot use their fingers accordingly, who suffer mental retardation. lenders.name: Karen Collacutt

lenders.occupational_info:
I work with families who make good money and who wonder at the end of the month where their money went.
They are living the life of their dreams but secretly fear that their money avoidance has created a financial mess they can't recover from.
When they work with me they stop the constant worry and start enjoying their life and money, confident and in control off their future.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I love paying it forward and appreciate all life has to offer.  Since these loans can significantly improve families' lives, it pays rewards to all.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell TV shows to cable networks in the US.

lenders.name: Konstantin
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lenders.name: Vintage Blue
lenders.loan_because:
Vintage Blue strives to support people in all aspects of life in need and encourages people to make a positive change.  We want to give our customers a say in which they want to support, so we have decided to let our customers donate 5% of their purchase to different organizations.

Vintage Blue believes and supports what KIVA is about and what it is doing for individuals in the developing world. We are honored to have the opportunity to offer to our customers the option to donate to KIVA
lenders.occupational_info:
Vintage Blue is a vintage-inspired sportswear line for women that holds the exclusive license to the All American Girls Professional Baseball League, featured in the movie “A League of Their Own” starring Madonna and Tom Hanks.  Vintage Blue considers itself a timeless brand that produces high quality garments using eco-friendly fabrics and dyes.  The company has and will continue to pursue licensing opportunities and draw inspiration from various sports genres throughout the eras.

Not only does Vintage Blue produce chemical-free garments, but it is a sustainable company in all aspects using eco-friendly materials when creating items like line sheets/catalogues, hang tags and more.

Vintage Blue is a socially conscience company donating 5% of profits to various organizations, implementing an internship program which fosters self esteem and garners opportunity to grow with the company to motivated young women, and creating campaigns that encourages people to make a positive change.

lenders.name: Evan
lenders.loan_because: micro-lending is the best way devised to end poverty.  I've found that in life if you want something to happen its best to do it yourself.
lenders.occupational_info: Arduous and expensive...learning.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: We all  need each other.  We have to help each other.  Peace is possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to be a teacher, but burned out from stress.  Am now unemployed and trying to find a new direction in life.  Helping others helps me see the point in living.

lenders.name: Pennie
lenders.loan_because: I don't need everything that I have and I want to share it with people that don't have what they need.

lenders.name: Ian & Kate
lenders.loan_because: It is easy, and because someone who already has an idea is just looking for that little push, to make it a reality
lenders.occupational_info: I retired some time ago.

lenders.name: Beacon Heights COB
lenders.loan_because: At Beacon Heights, we believe Jesus Christ calls and empowers us to be servants in our community and world. We want to share in word and deed the Good News of God's love and care for all people.
lenders.occupational_info: Our church is committed to working for peace in our city, nation and world.

lenders.name: Mat & Karla
lenders.loan_because: people less fortunate than us deserve a chance in life.

lenders.name: Alana

lenders.occupational_info: I study music at an arts highschool. I hope to be a classical guitarist someday.

lenders.loan_because: I think I am fortunate enough to be able to lend to some people who really need this money..( though I am not at all reach ...& have  a huge loan for my education.

lenders.name: Sara-Linnéa
lenders.loan_because: Someone else might use my savings while I don't need them - they will do so much more good this way compared to just sitting in the bank.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm an accountant at a small IT firm that develops and manufactures electronic devices for network communications.

lenders.occupational_info: Pensioner

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: ... this little step I do may help someone to jump forward in life.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: My life is abundant and I want to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I design decorative flags for people to display outside of their homes.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I want to enable people to be empowered and encourage economic development in poorer parts of the world. Loans are a covenant to ensure investment generates measurable economic growth over the repayment period, or serve to reward those who are able to generate consistent income by improving their quality of life. The gains made by someone receiving a loan are not gifts from the lender, but entirely earned by the borrower. The culture created by borrowing and carefully managing debt is constructive to development.
lenders.occupational_info: I make games that are played using computers. I love to see people entertained -- no matter how good or bad life gets, there is always room to play games, to escape from their daily life for a time. I provide people with that opportunity.

lenders.name: Wim Leers
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a better world :)

lenders.name: Carol

lenders.occupational_info: Satisfying...I feel fortunate to do what I like.

lenders.loan_because: We are a committee of four people who conduct meetings periodically. Each member at these meetings proposes at least one candidate to whom to give a loan.  The other three board members review the proposal and support requires unanimous consent.

I work for a large entertainment company's Internet site as a writer -- I write stories, polls, game copy, and whatever other text might be needed. 

My husband is a musician and artist, and works for a company that makes microphones.

lenders.occupational_info: Alot of the Samoan churchs need uniforms for church, I've been helping alot of these churches in doing that by printing their logos on materials (fabrics) then having them sewn with manufacturers so I can give them a good deal.  I love helping people and decided to make this into a business.

lenders.name: Agung
lenders.loan_because: God loves me and everyone on this earth very much. God is very generous and everything belongs to Him. I want to be a good steward of His money.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide accounting service to Hedge Fund managers and the goal is to prevent fraud within the fund. Madoff's scam will not work if he hired third party service like my company. The goal is that investors can be confident that their money is invested properly.

lenders.loan_because:
I need a loan person to person, I have serious problems with my Renting and a beautiful child of 5 years, I need the money to afford the move and the coupling of the new house, I have stable work and paypal account, but I do not have the means to achieve money in another way.
is that there are even good-hearted people in this world, only hope that God guide someone to my request. I need 200 or 250 dollars.

Thanks
lenders.occupational_info: Stable, working in an airline, not earn much but enough to live.

lenders.loan_because: We want to support entrepreneurship and help individuals lead their way out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Our company helps clients get the most from their processes, to better meet the needs of their customers and shareholders.

lenders.name: KiMM!E
lenders.loan_because: I'm too broke to give it away.

lenders.name: Theresa & Thomas
lenders.loan_because: We believe in people.
lenders.occupational_info: Theresa works with computers at a university.  Thomas does many things, from massage therapy to painting houses.

lenders.name: In Memory of Theo
lenders.loan_because: We started this account on Aug 15, 2008 the day that would have been our son Theo's second birthday. He passed away on May 28, 2008. He was a beautiful and mighty baby who overcame many medical challenges. We want to keep his loving spirit alive by making the world a better place in small ways. We love you Theo.

lenders.name: Sam and Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: We feel so lucky in life and we want to help other people feel the same way
lenders.occupational_info: Sam - an environmental attorney that works to ensure the integrity of our nations water and Elizabeth - an elementary school teacher that molds young minds

lenders.name: Jeff & Alice
lenders.loan_because: It seems to us that the best way to help people is to help them succeed at what they are already doing.  Let the direction of help come from them first.  If they can walk, we'd like to help them run.
lenders.occupational_info: Alice teaches children who are 5 to 6 years old.  Jeff works at a bank (not Kiva related), helping with the forms required to lend money to our local farmers and businessmen.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: Using microfinance to invest in other people’s dreams is very rewarding for me.  To give the opportunity where there was none is what it’s all about.  One by one we will make the world a better place!
lenders.occupational_info: Identify problems; identify potential solutions;  match the best solution to the problem.

lenders.loan_because: i want to help the people that have ambitions to better themselves and their way of living.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: everybody needs some help sometime.

lenders.loan_because: i believe in the long term benefits (both economic and cultural) of microlending.  i think microlending is an elegant and sustainable solution that helps the right people in the right ways.
lenders.occupational_info: i (my company) helps other companies do better business by giving them better technology

lenders.occupational_info: I want to personally invite you to join all of us here on Kiva! You can set up an account and help families by giving a small business loan to entrepreneurs in developing countries all over the world!
